title: Chapter 83
body:
Chapter 83


The “Lolita” voice in the video must not be the real voice of “Unpleasant Rain”! Anyway, many players had never heard her actual voice, plus she was always mocking people with her chat bubbles, people would rather play along in framing “Unpleasant Rain”. Don’t forget her extreme wealthiness, nowadays many would hold jealousy against the rich.


Hence, many players would be envious of the fancy, cool equipment of this “Great swordmistress” as she walked towards the Arena. Just because they were all in the safe zone in which the system did not allow any PK-s, many of them who had been beaten up and humiliated by “Unpleasant Rain” would happily tag along to cuss and badmouth her whenever they saw any crowd booing her.


Sitting in front of the screen reading all these chat bubbles, “Yu Shengfan” smirked, “These weaklings are amusing, I wanna play games even more now!”, she said to herself with her cute lolita voice.


Speaking of that, she began to type without showing signs of her slowing down. Who cares if the crowd was talking crap about her, she would mock them in return one by one!


“I really couldn’t think of any languages to reply to an alienate species, but since everyone greeted me with such sincerity, I had to reply everyone, I wouldn’t want to be rude, you see? Be thankful for your princess, it would be your honors to receive my reply!”


“You said I’m thick skinned? I think yours is thicker, that even mosquitoes will have trouble sucking your blood, as they have to struggle a whole night just to get into your veins. Pity the mosquitoes which bite you…”


“Shameless? Oh, I get it! You are so heartless and shameless, your body weight would be lighter right? I’m really jealous of you.”


“I know, you’re a cute, fascinating, hardworking mongrel, a new type of mongrel who is always serving the people!”


“My equipment look ugly? Lemme take a look at yours, oh a bear suit huh? Animals would turn into humans with this equipment, while you become an animal when you wear it, huhu…”


…


Even with numbers, none could actually be an opponent to “Unpleasant Rain”, the cuss words were mostly “f***”, “c***”, “p****”, as if they were running out of words. Until they could think of a fancy way to retort her, “Unpleasant Rain” was already in the arena. In contrast, “Unpleasant Rain” could mock them instantly without any vulgar or repetitive words, and even her chat bubble was longer than theirs. Not to mention the glamorous effects framing her chat bubble, she had spent almost thousands customizing her unique chat bubble frame to make it an eye-catching one. A rich player indeed.


Since the others were not able to mock her alone, they felt like tearing “Unpleasant Rain” into pieces, but they were restricted in the safe zone, which rendered them angry and helpless.


“Unpleasant Rain” was indeed a master of languages. Whenever this scene was read by readers in reality, they would immediately forget about her debut appearance of “Mary Sue”, a decorative female character. Instead, they would be impressed by this “language master” who could make all the haters speechless. How awesome!


In the same cyber cafe, Lin Feng’s best pal, Tang Yongkai, was preparing to go into the arena for a solo battle. As his character “Hoodlum Master”, was walking towards the arena, he saw the crowds were booing against “Unpleasant Rain”, just to be countered and silenced by her in no time. Of course he had heard of “Unpleasant Rain”, but he was unaware of the rumors about “Unpleasant Rain”. All he knew was that “Unpleasant Rain” was a liar, a ladyboy. It should be a truth as it was impossible for everyone to hate “Unpleasant Rain” right?


Little did Tang Yongkai know that this was a true truth. It could not be helped though. “Unpleasant Rain’s” chat bubbles were really despicable, and she had been looking down on people when she was simultaneously typing and fighting, yet no one had won her over!


If one could win “Unpleasant Rain” in a fight, they could actually ignore whatever she said. That would just make her look like a child who just lost in a battle, and start spitting out those poisonous words. In reality, not only she had a gaming skill that surpassed almost everyone, yet with that unforgiving mouth of hers, she had made everyone who battled her felt really helpless…


Tang Yongkai was quite confident with his player skills in solo battle, as he was placed number 7 on the ranking board since he seldom played solo. What made him curious was that his leader Lin Feng, was not interested in PvP ranking at all.


He would just light up a cigarette and smile, with nothing said. Tang Yongkai was unaware of Lin Feng’s past in the professional arena, and the glorious results had Lin Feng had obtained in the one on one battle.


Lin Feng had already lost the interest in solo battles long ago, simply because no one had ever won over him, especially during his prime… Now he even had the golden finger, which made him even stronger, so… who could possibly win him on a one on one battle?


Lin Feng only sought to return to the professional arena, at the head of his own team, yielding no result lesser than victory in the finals, obtaining the title of “The Strongest King”. As for one-on-one battles, he only thought of it as children’s play.


Tang Yongkai had followed Yu Shengfan into the arena, and began his match in the one on one battle.


Fate, was always amazing beyond words.


Tang Yongkai’s “Hoodlum Master” was matched up against Yu Shengfan’s “Unpleasant Rain”, which had made Tang Yongkai’s blood boiling, “Boss! Boss! Look who I got matched up with! ‘Unpleasant Rain’! I heard that he was a ladyboy liar, a fat otaku in reality!” Tang Yongkai told Lin Feng
